title: Problem since new game laucher on the 24th of april...
body:
ok now im really pissed off at the game! 

the game keep having the same bug beeing the infamous black screen
after the champion slect countdown and strangely, i can heard the sound in the background all the time.

But another thing is that now the game refuse to let me exit via ctrl+alt+delete and can't event do alt+tab....

What give? i mean i wrote Riot in report a bug section or ask them what solution can i do... and still havent heard from them. 
and apparently im not the only one that this is happening. 

anyway, this is an awsome game, but since monday i just keep screeming atit( litteraly)

TO THE DEV:  i really hope you guy's can fix this issue.....

replies.body: This same thing is happening to me. I am getting quite irritated by it and its causing too many problems.
Have you read the troubleshooting information for the new launcher?

where is that?

i meant care to give me a link so i can find it?
thank in adavance:)

but now got to deal with this bloody leaverbuster thing....

ok now it happened AGAIN!!!!

deleted the entire game and everything that came with it, and did a full re-install.
but got the same problem.
